name: Wheel Fear
description:
Stuck in a wheelchair.
Lost in an hospital.
With a creature after you.

Can you survive?

You woke up alone in an hospital room, in a wheelchair.
The last thing you remember was heading home in your car.
Unable to walk with your leg in cast, you decide to look for help.
But the hospital is empty and decrepit. You need to leave this place...

Before the thing who lurk among these walls get you.


Features :
- An horror adventure with a retro style.
- No hand holding, use the clues in the story and environment to find your way.
- An innovative control scheme.
- Two endings, for the ones who get to the bottom of the story.
- Terror at the tip of your fingers !
